title: Error "pdb2pqr" not installed
body:
Hi, 
I keep getting this error:

```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportError                               Traceback (most recent call last)
/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/moleculekit/tools/preparation.py in <module>
     13 try:
---> 14     from pdb2pqr.main import runPDB2PQR
     15     from pdb2pqr.src.pdb import readPDB

ImportError: cannot import name 'runPDB2PQR' from 'pdb2pqr.main' (/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/pdb2pqr/main.py)

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

ImportError                               Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-19-680c16efde02> in <module>
      2 from moleculekit.tools.voxeldescriptors import getVoxelDescriptors, viewVoxelFeatures
      3 from moleculekit.tools.atomtyper import prepareProteinForAtomtyping
----> 4 from moleculekit.tools.preparation import proteinPrepare
      5 import torch
      6 

/usr/local/lib/python3.9/site-packages/moleculekit/tools/preparation.py in <module>
     15     from pdb2pqr.src.pdb import readPDB
     16 except ImportError:
---> 17     raise ImportError(
     18         "pdb2pqr not installed. To use the molecule preparation features please do `conda install htmd-pdb2pqr -c acellera`"
     19     )

ImportError: pdb2pqr not installed. To use the molecule preparation features please do `conda install htmd-pdb2pqr -c acellera`

```


However pdb2pqr is installed in the recommended way.

The error appears anytime I do:

```
from moleculekit.tools.atomtyper import prepareProteinForAtomtyping

prot = Molecule(os.path.abspath(os.path.join(PATH_PDB, file)))

# If your structure is fully protonated and contains all bond information in prot.bonds skip this step!
prot = prepareProteinForAtomtyping(prot)
...
```
or even only importing the following module
```
from moleculekit.tools.preparation import proteinPrepare
...
``` 

Any solution?
